features.name: Smash
features.description: Melee: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) bludgeoning damage.

features.name: Twin Slash
features.description: Melee: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., two targets, or the same target twice. Hit: 5 (1d8 + 1) slashing damage.

features.name: Slashing Vortex
features.description: Melee: DC 14 vs DEX, reach 10 ft., all targets. Hit: 15 (2d12 + 2) slashing damage.
